entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 p.m. PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 1:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: SSE 27 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Rain beginning before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm except 30 mm near Fernie. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
